author: The Hindu
title: A million and counting
description: The global spread of the virus is continuing despite mitigation efforts
content: On April 2, the number of novel coronavirus (SARS-CoV-2) infections in 181 countries/regions crossed one million, and deaths passed 50,000. On April 3, the total number of cases and deaths stood at 10,39,166 and 55,092, respectively. With 2,45,646 cases, the … [+2611 chars]
